items.title: Former CNN host Don Lemon arrested after anti-ICE protests at Minnesota church
items.description: Lemon says he was just doing his job as a journalist reporting on the protests at the church.

items.title: Luigi Mangione will not face death penalty if convicted, judge rules
items.description: The judge dismissed a federal murder charge against the 27 year old.

items.title: UN risks 'imminent financial collapse', secretary general warns
items.description: Ant√≥nio Guterres says the international body could run out of money by July due to members' unpaid fees.

items.title: Three reasons for the record rise in gold prices, and one why they are falling
items.description: Gold has fallen from recent highs but there are several reasons investors are still finding refuge in the precious metal.

items.title: Trump tells Iran to drop nuclear aims and stop killing protesters to avoid military action
items.description: Iran's Foreign Minister Araghchi says armed forces had "fingers on the trigger" to respond to any US strike.
